long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily download and save any video from Facebook with our Download Facebook Video. This tool is user-friendly—simply add it to your browser, and it will do the rest.

How it works:

- The downloader adds a Download button to any Facebook video.
- Click the button, select a location, and the download starts immediately.
- If you can't see the button, play the video, and it will appear.

Key Features:

- Download any Facebook video, including those embedded on other websites.
- Completely anonymous—video owners won't know you've downloaded their content.
Supports HD and SD quality.

FAQs:

- How to download a Facebook video? Add the extension, click the Download button, and you're done.
- Can I download embedded Facebook videos? Yes, from any website.
- Can I download YouTube videos? No, this tool only works for Facebook videos.
- Note: Password-protected videos cannot be downloaded.

Add to Chrome and enjoy!
